00041 
00042 std::string TSum::get_name() const
00043   { return mu1->get_name() + '+' + mu2->get_name(); }
00044 
00045 TSum::~TSum() {}
00046 
00047 template <unsigned DIM> inline
00048 bool TSum::eval( const MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& T, 
00049                  double& result, 
00050                  MsqError& err )
00051 {
00052   double val2;
00053   bool rval = mu1->evaluate( T, result, err );
00054   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00055   bool rval2 = mu2->evaluate( T, val2, err );
00056   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00057   result += val2;
00058   return rval && rval2;
00059 }
00060 
00061 template <unsigned DIM> inline
00062 bool TSum::grad( const MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& T, 
00063                  double& result, 
00064                  MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& deriv, 
00065                  MsqError& err )
00066 {
00067   double val2;
00068   MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM> grad2;
00069   bool rval = mu1->evaluate_with_grad( T, result, deriv, err );
00070   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00071   bool rval2 = mu2->evaluate_with_grad( T, val2, grad2, err );
00072   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00073   result += val2;
00074   deriv += grad2;
00075   return rval && rval2;
00076 }
00077 
00078 template <unsigned DIM> inline
00079 bool TSum::hess( const MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& T, 
00080                  double& result, 
00081                  MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& deriv_wrt_T, 
00082                  MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>* second_wrt_T,
00083                  MsqError& err )
00084 {
00085   const int HL = (DIM*(DIM+1))/2;
00086   double val2;
00087   MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM> grad2, hess2[HL];
00088 
00089   bool rval = mu1->evaluate_with_hess( T, result, deriv_wrt_T, second_wrt_T, err );
00090   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00091   bool rval2 = mu2->evaluate_with_hess( T, val2, grad2, hess2, err );
00092   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00093   result += val2;
00094   deriv_wrt_T += grad2;
00095   for (int i = 0; i < HL; ++i)
00096     second_wrt_T[i] += hess2[i];
00097   return rval && rval2;
00098 }
